attributes.action: Give parents/teachers the option for children to resit the school year.
attributes.additional_details: This needs to be addressed as after this 3rd lockdown, children will have missed nearly off school, being educated the bare minimum through home learning as it's very hard to get a child to pay attention and concentrate as much as they would in an academic setting
attributes.background: Help the children who are struggling with home schooling who are up to a year behind classmates, this could in the form of longer school days to ensure the curriculum is understood,for those that are far behind and struggling offer them the choice of resitting the year.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326223
